item.description:
Here is the advertisement:

http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Anarchist-Society-of-Shakespeareans/195235037166260#!/photo.php?fbid=297708376918925&set=a.195240527165711.44593.195235037166260&type=1&theater

We love Shakespeare. Measure for Measure is one of his plays that is a little hard to interpret because there are different versions of it; so you should review it before attending. 

Although I'm not familiar with the group which is hosting this, or the quality of the production, I'm sure there will still be a quality intellectual challenge to be had.

LETS MEET AT DEADALUS FOR A BEER BEFORE THIS MEETUP. IT'S RIGHT NEXT DOOR. LOOK FOR  PEOPLE WITH HATS AT THE BAR --PLEASE WEAR HATS. IF YOU SKIP DEADALUS, MEET US AT THE DEMOCRACY CENTER FOR THE PLAY, 45 MOUNT AUBURN ST @ 8 PM. THEY ARE ASKING FOR A 5 $ DONATION THERE.

BE SURE & GET TO THE PLAY EARLY TO GRAB YOUR SEAT--FIRST COME FIRST SERVE.

http://www.daedalusharvardsquare.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Please wear hats. Look for people wearing hats.
item.name: Measure for Measure --"Shakespearean" version
